mas = list(map(int, input().split()))
t = mas[0]
for j in range(t):
    mas = list(map(int, input().split()))
    n = mas[0]
    if n == 1:
        print(1)
    elif n == 2:
        print(-1)
    else:
        lst = [[0 for k in range(n)] for i in range(n)]
        ii = 0
        jj = 0
        ind = 1
        for k in range(n):
            ii = 0
            jj = k
            while jj > -1 and ii < n:
                lst[ii][jj] = str(ind)
                ind += 1
                jj -= 1
                ii += 1
        for k in range(1, n):
            ii = k
            jj = n - 1
            while jj > -1 and ii < n:
                lst[ii][jj] = str(ind)
                ind += 1
                jj -= 1
                ii += 1
        lst[0][0] = str(n * n)
        lst[n - 1][n - 1] = '1'
        for i in range(n):
            print(' '.join(lst[i]))
